reviewtext: The sound on these is astonishing for the ridiculously low price. Like all headphones, they are not perfect -- for instance, they sit on my ears in a little bit of an unnatural way, and so I find myself readjusting them every now and again in the vain hope of getting a better placement -- but if you're looking for a great sounding, knock-around pair of headphones for portable use, I highly recommend these.
summary: Can't Go Wrong for the Price
